name: spire-javascript-client
description: Spire API Javascript client for both browser and Node.

scripts.build: node node_modules/.bin/grunt build-prod && npm run-script test
scripts.build-dev: node node_modules/.bin/grunt build-dev && npm run-script test
scripts.test: node node_modules/.bin/grunt build-test && npm run-script test-no-build

author: Spire
